instance_template: speaker("Alpha"). speaker("Beta"). amplifier("AmpX"). amplifier("AmpY"). player("Streamer1"). player("Streamer2").
generator: 1 { selected_speaker(S) : speaker(S) } 1. 1 { selected_amplifier(A) : amplifier(A) } 1. 1 { selected_player(P) : player(P) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: It is required that if the speaker designated as "Alpha" is selected, the associated amplifier must be exclusively "AmpX".
The simultaneous selection of amplifier "AmpY" and media player "Streamer1" is strictly prohibited.
It is required that if the media player designated as "Streamer2" is selected, the associated speaker must be exclusively "Beta".
